landing.two: The only site that brings together the three stakeholders: alumni, training institutes and employers
landing.three: The job portal takes care of qualifying you professionally, training you technically, enhancing your self-confidence, and assisting you in searching for a suitable job that guarantees you the future

platform.title: The portal platform for vocational rehabilitation
platform.desc: Gatein platform is devoted to your professional qualification and evaluating your qualifications by consultants and providing the specialized courses that you need and helping you in obtaining a suitable job
platform.card_desc1: You will find a large number of training institutes offering training courses to you according to your choice or according to the guidance of consultants on the platform
platform.card_desc2: We show you the jobs requested by Iraqi companies, institutions and organizations. Find the right jo
platform.card_desc3: We show you the CVs of job seekers who have been professionally qualified at the Gateway Center according to their specializations
platform.card_desc4: We have experts in the field of small and medium enterprise management to help you implement your pioneering projects

search_work.head: For job seekers
search_work.title: Get the best jobs that suit your qualifications with the best companies
search_work.desc: A platform created for you to help you get the right jobs. We also have features and services that we provide to you, such as:

program_help.title: Vocational rehabilitation program to help you get a suitable job
program_help.desc: he program consists of four workshops: 1- Writing a CV for a graduate with no previous experience. 2- Writing a job application letter. 3- Job interview. 4- Work ethics and job behavior

bosses.head: The bosses
bosses.title: Search for qualified employees to fill your available positions
bosses.desc: A platform created for you to help you get the right employees for you. We also have features and services that we provide to you, such as: advertisements

articles.tittle: Learn about the special services we offer you
articles.brief: A platform created for you to help you find the right jobs. We also have features and services that we provide for you:

store.title: The Gateway App is now available for download
store.disc: The Work Gateway takes care of your professional qualification, technical training, boosts your self-confidence, and helps you in finding a suitable job that ensures your future.

footer.app: The app is now available on:
footer.title: Work Gateway for Professional Qualification and Entrepreneurship

whoUs.name: Dr/ Fouad Jamil Al-Azzawi
whoUs.desc: Founder of the Business Gate, Entrepreneurship and Information Technology Company - an Iraqi company officially registered on 4/7/2023
whoUs.desc1: The doctor studied in Iraq, Egypt, Britain, France, and Romania, and trained in America. He also taught in Libya, Jordan, the Sultanate of Oman, and at Al-Rafidain University College
whoUs.desc2: The doctor's last job: Director of Al-Rafidain Unit for Rehabilitation, Employment and Follow-up, where he supervised the rehabilitation of hundreds of graduates, and a number of them had the occasion
whoUs.story: A dream that has haunted me for many years is to employ my academic, professional and educational experience in a special project to qualify graduates from all Iraqi colleges and universities and help them find a suitable job that puts them on the path to building their future and achieving their goals in life and in community service after I have lived with the suffering and frustration that graduates are exposed to In search of a job that preserves their dignity among their peers in society, in 2018 the Iraqi Ministry of Higher Education adopted a project to qualify graduates among Iraqi governmental universities in cooperation with IREX International. As the first university institution eligible to enroll in public universities and form the Al-Rafidain Unit for Rehabilitation and Employment, I was assigned as a teaching member of the Department of Computer Engineering to manage this unit. I was trained to manage the unit and licensed by the Department of Studies
